languages.text: While the Protecting Mastiff is near the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}Protected{/g} ally, it makes a free melee attack against any enemy around it each time that enemy hits the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}Protected{/g} ally. It’s triggered by both melee and ranged attacks and also corresponding abilities. If the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}Protected{/g} ally moves, the Mastiff dashes after them as a free reaction, trying to stay close.

traits.locale_text: While the Protecting Mastiff is near the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}Protected{/g} ally, it makes a free melee attack against any enemy around it each time that enemy hits the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}Protected{/g} ally. It’s triggered by both melee and ranged attacks and also corresponding abilities. If the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}Protected{/g} ally moves, the Mastiff dashes after them as a free reaction, trying to stay close.

languages.text: Whenever an enemy attacks the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} ally, this cyber-mastiff makes a free {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against the attacker, if possible, dealing −50% less damage. To do so, it can move to any cell adjacent to that ally, spending 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. If the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} ally moves, this cyber-mastiff follows them during that ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, spending 0 MP.
languages.original_text: Когда враг совершает {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} по союзнику {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}под охраной{/g}, кибермастиф, если возможно, атакует этого врага вблизи вне лимита атак на {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, нанося урон, уменьшенный на 50%. Для этого он может переместиться на любую клетку, соседнюю с этим союзником, без затрат {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}. Если союзник {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}под охраной{/g} двигается, кибермастиф следует за ним в его ход без затрат ОП.

To do so, it can move to any cell adjacent to that ally, spending 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. If the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} ally moves, this cyber-mastiff follows them during that ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, spending 0 MP.

Whenever an enemy {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} ally, this cyber-mastiff makes a free {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against the attacker, if possible, dealing −50% less damage. To do so, it can move to any cell adjacent to that ally, spending 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. If the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} ally moves, this cyber-mastiff follows them during that ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, spending 0 MP.

Whenever an enemy {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} ally, this cyber-mastiff makes a free {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against the attacker, if possible, dealing −50% less damage. To do so, it can move to any cell adjacent to that ally, spending 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. If the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} ally moves, this cyber-mastiff follows them during that ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, spending 0 MP.

languages.text: Bir düşman, {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}korunan{/g} dost birime saldırdığında bu siber mastif, mümkünse saldırgana %50 daha az hasar veren serbest bir {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısı{/g} gerçekleştirir. Bunun için 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} harcayarak bu dost birimin bitişiğindeki bir hücreye ilerleyebilir. Siber mastif, {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}korunan{/g} dost birim hareket ederse dost birimin {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} esnasında 0 HP harcayarak onu takip eder.

To do so, it can move to any cell adjacent to that ally, spending 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. traits.locale_text: Bir düşman, {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}korunan{/g} dost birime saldırdığında bu siber mastif, mümkünse saldırgana %50 daha az hasar veren serbest bir {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısı{/g} gerçekleştirir. Siber mastif, {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}korunan{/g} dost birim hareket ederse dost birimin {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} esnasında 0 HP harcayarak onu takip eder.

Bir düşman, {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}korunan{/g} dost birime vurduğunda bu siber mastif, mümkünse saldırgana %50 daha az hasar veren serbest bir yakın dövüş saldırısı gerçekleştirir. Bunun için 0 HP harcayarak bu dost birimin bitişiğindeki bir hücreye ilerleyebilir. Siber mastif, {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}korunan{/g} dost birim hareket ederse dost birimin {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} esnasında 0 HP harcayarak onu takip eder.

Bir düşman, {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}korunan{/g} dost birime {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurduğunda{/g} bu siber mastif, mümkünse saldırgana %50 daha az hasar veren serbest bir {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısı{/g} gerçekleştirir. Bunun için 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} harcayarak bu dost birimin bitişiğindeki bir hücreye ilerleyebilir. Siber mastif, {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}korunan{/g} dost birim hareket ederse dost birimin {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} esnasında 0 HP harcayarak onu takip eder.

languages.text: Cada vez que un enemigo ataque al aliado {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protegido{/g}, este cibermastín realiza un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} gratuito contra el atacante (si es posible) y le inflige un −50 % menos de daño. Para ello, puede moverse a cualquier casilla adyacente a ese aliado gastando 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}. Si el aliado {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protegido{/g} se mueve, el cibermastín le seguirá durante el {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del aliado gastando 0 PM.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy attacks the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} ally, this cyber-mastiff makes a free {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against the attacker, if possible, dealing −50% less damage. To do so, it can move to any cell adjacent to that ally, spending 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. If the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} ally moves, this cyber-mastiff follows them during that ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, spending 0 MP.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que un enemigo ataque al aliado {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protegido{/g}, este cibermastín realiza un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} gratuito contra el atacante (si es posible) y le inflige un −50 % menos de daño. Para ello, puede moverse a cualquier casilla adyacente a ese aliado gastando 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}. Si el aliado {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protegido{/g} se mueve, el cibermastín le seguirá durante el {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del aliado gastando 0 PM.

Cada vez que un enemigo {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}golpee{/g} al aliado {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protegido{/g}, este cibermastín realiza un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} gratuito contra el atacante (si es posible) y le inflige un −50 % menos de daño. Para ello, puede moverse a cualquier casilla adyacente a ese aliado gastando 0 PM. Si el aliado {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protegido{/g} se mueve, el cibermastín le seguirá durante el {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del aliado gastando 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}.

languages.text: 每当敌人攻击{g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}受到守护{/g}的盟友时，在可能的情况下，生化獒犬会对攻击者进行无消耗的{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}，造成的伤害降低50%。准备发动攻击期间，生化獒犬可以移动至该盟友身边的任意格子处，不消耗{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。如果{g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}受到守护{/g}的盟友向远处移动，则生化獒犬也会在盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}中自动跟随，不消耗移动点数。
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy attacks the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} ally, this cyber-mastiff makes a free {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against the attacker, if possible, dealing −50% less damage. To do so, it can move to any cell adjacent to that ally, spending 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. If the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} ally moves, this cyber-mastiff follows them during that ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, spending 0 MP.

traits.locale_text: 每当敌人攻击{g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}受到守护{/g}的盟友时，在可能的情况下，生化獒犬会对攻击者进行无消耗的{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}，造成的伤害降低50%。准备发动攻击期间，生化獒犬可以移动至该盟友身边的任意格子处，不消耗{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。如果{g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}受到守护{/g}的盟友向远处移动，则生化獒犬也会在盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}中自动跟随，不消耗移动点数。

languages.text: Wenn ein Gegner den {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}beschützten{/g} Charakter attackiert, führt der Cyber-Mastiff (sofern möglich) einen kostenlosen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} auf den Angreifer aus und verursacht dabei −50 % weniger Schaden. Dazu kann er sich für 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} auf ein beliebiges, an diesen Verbündeten angrenzendes Feld bewegen. Bewegt sich der {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}beschützte{/g} Verbündete, folgt ihm der Cyber-Mastiff während des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des Verbündeten für 0 BP.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy attacks the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} ally, this cyber-mastiff makes a free {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against the attacker, if possible, dealing −50% less damage. To do so, it can move to any cell adjacent to that ally, spending 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. If the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} ally moves, this cyber-mastiff follows them during that ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, spending 0 MP.

traits.locale_text: Wenn ein Gegner den {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}beschützten{/g} Charakter attackiert, führt der Cyber-Mastiff (sofern möglich) einen kostenlosen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} auf den Angreifer aus und verursacht dabei −50 % weniger Schaden. Dazu kann er sich für 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} auf ein beliebiges, an diesen Verbündeten angrenzendes Feld bewegen. Bewegt sich der {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}beschützte{/g} Verbündete, folgt ihm der Cyber-Mastiff während des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des Verbündeten für 0 BP.

languages.text: Chaque fois qu'un ennemi attaque l'allié {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protégé{/g}, le cyber-mastiff exécute une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} gratuite s'il le peut, infligeant 50 % de dégâts en moins à l'assaillant. Dans ce but, il peut se déplacer gratuitement sur n'importe quelle case adjacente à cet allié. Si l'allié {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protégé{/g} se déplace, le cyber-mastiff le suit immédiatement lors de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} sans dépenser de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy attacks the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} ally, this cyber-mastiff makes a free {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against the attacker, if possible, dealing −50% less damage. To do so, it can move to any cell adjacent to that ally, spending 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. If the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} ally moves, this cyber-mastiff follows them during that ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, spending 0 MP.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois qu'un ennemi attaque l'allié {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protégé{/g}, le cyber-mastiff exécute une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} gratuite s'il le peut, infligeant 50 % de dégâts en moins à l'assaillant. Dans ce but, il peut se déplacer gratuitement sur n'importe quelle case adjacente à cet allié. Si l'allié {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protégé{/g} se déplace, le cyber-mastiff le suit immédiatement lors de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} sans dépenser de PD.

languages.text: 敵が{g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}保護された{/g}味方に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃{/g}すると、サイバーマスチフはその攻撃者に対して自由な{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}を行い、該当する場合に、ダメージは−50%となる。そうするために、0{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}でその味方に隣接するセルに移動することができる。{g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}保護された{/g}味方が移動すると、サイバーマスチフは0MPで味方の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の間にそれらに付いていく。

To do so, it can move to any cell adjacent to that ally, spending 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. If the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} ally moves, this cyber-mastiff follows them during that ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, spending 0 MP.

traits.locale_text: 敵が{g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}保護された{/g}味方に攻撃すると、サイバーマスチフはその攻撃者に対して自由な近接攻撃を行い、該当する場合に、ダメージは−50%となる。そうするために、0MPでその味方に隣接するセルに移動することができる。{g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}保護された{/g}味方が移動すると、サイバーマスチフは0MPで味方のターンの間にそれらに付いていく。

敵が{g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}保護された{/g}味方に攻撃すると、サイバーマスチフはその攻撃者に対して自由な近接攻撃を行い、該当する場合に、ダメージは−50%となる。そうするために、0MPでその味方に隣接するセルに移動することができる。{g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}保護された{/g}味方が移動すると、サイバーマスチフは0MPで味方のターンの間にそれらに付いていく。

Когда враг атакует союзника {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}под охраной{/g}, кибермастиф, если возможно, атакует этого врага вне лимита атак на {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, нанося урон, уменьшенный на 50%.
